titles.title: A resolution honoring the life of the late Herb Brooks and expressing the deepest condolences of the Senate to his family on his death.
A resolution honoring the life of the late Herb Brooks and expressing the deepest condolences of the Senate to his family on his death.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Pays tribute to Herb Brooks (who coached the 1980 U.S. Hockey team to the gold medal at the 1980 Olympic Games).
